div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 110px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 335px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: nowrap;

+ getUser(String): Optional<User> + exists(String): bool
